```{r mysql}
config <- yaml.load_file("mysql_config.yml")

projectId <- '2862345'

con <- dbConnect(MySQL(),
                 user = config$username,
                 password = config$password,
                 host = config$host,
                 dbname='warehouse')

nMonths <- 12

originDate <- as.POSIXct(Sys.Date(), origin="1970-01-01", tz="PST")

dateRanges <- ldply(seq(nMonths, 0, by=-1),
                    function(x) {
                      data.frame(number=x,
                                 begin=originDate - months(x + 1),
                                 end=originDate - months(x)) %>% 
                        mutate(beginTimestamp=as.numeric(begin) * 1000,
                               endTimestamp=as.numeric(end) * 1000)
                    })

data.browse <- ddply(dateRanges, .(number), 
                     function(x) {getWebAccess(projectId, 
                                               x$beginTimestamp, 
                                               x$endTimestamp)})

foo <- data.browse %>%
  filter(RESPONSE_STATUS == 200) %>%
  count(userid, id, DATE, TIMESTAMP, NODE_TYPE) %>% 
  ungroup() %>% 
  mutate(id=as.character(id))

allEntities <- synQuery(sprintf('select id,name from entity where projectId=="syn%s"', projectId)) %>% 
  dplyr::rename(id=entity.id, name=entity.name) %>% 
  mutate(id=str_replace(id, "syn", ""))

data.browse <- left_join(foo, allEntities, by="id")
```

```{r summaryuseraccess}
# Get user profile info for users in data download records
allUsersList <- ldply(unique(data.browse$userid),
                      function(x) {
                        foo <- synGetUserProfile(x); 
                        data.frame(userId=as.character(x),
                                   userName=foo@userName)})

allUsers <- left_join(allUsersList, aclUserList)
levels(allUsers$teamId) <- c(levels(allUsers$teamId), "None") 
allUsers$teamId[is.na(allUsers$teamId)] <- "None"

allUsers$group <- "Other"
teamInfo <- ddply(allUsers %>% filter(teamId != "None") %>% select(teamId) %>% unique(),
                  .(teamId),
                  function(x) {
                    tmp <- synRestGET(sprintf("/team/%s", x$teamId)); 
                    data.frame(teamId=x$teamId, teamName=tmp$name)
                    }
                  )


allUsers <- left_join(allUsers, teamInfo, by="teamId")
levels(allUsers$teamName) <- c(levels(allUsers$teamName), "None") 
allUsers$teamName[is.na(allUsers$teamName)] <- "None"
```

#### Website access per day
```{r loadperday, include=TRUE, eval=TRUE}
### Daily usage
data.browse <- data.browse %>%
  mutate(date=as.Date(as.character(DATE)),
         userId=as.character(userid)) %>% 
  left_join(., allUsers)

perdayCount <- data.browse %>%
  count(teamName, date) %>% 
  arrange(n)
```

```{r plotperday, fig.width=20, fig.height=6, include=TRUE, eval=TRUE}
### Per day usage, total
plotdata <- perdayCount %>% 
  dcast(date ~ teamName, value.var='n', fill=0) %>% 
  reshape::melt(., id.vars=c("date"), 
                variable.name="teamName", value.name="n") %>% 
  dplyr::rename(group=variable, n=value)

thresh <- 1000
plotdata$n[plotdata$n > thresh] <- thresh

p <- ggplot(plotdata, aes(x=date, y=n)) + geom_line(aes(group=group, color=group), size=1)+ geom_point(aes(group=group, color=group), size=1)
p <- p + scale_color_brewer(palette = "Set1")
# p <- p + scale_x_date(breaks = "1 week", minor_breaks = "1 day",
#                       labels = date_format("%b-%Y"),
#                       limits = c(as.Date(beginDate), as.Date(endDate)))
p  <- p + mytheme + theme(axis.title.x=element_blank(),
                          axis.text.x=element_text(size=16, angle=270),
                          legend.position="top")
p
```

#### Accesses per day per user
```{r plotperdayperuser, fig.width=20, fig.height=6, include=TRUE, eval=TRUE}
plotdata <- data.browse %>%
  group_by(teamName) %>% 
  count(date, userName, userId, teamName) %>% 
  ungroup()

p <- ggplot(plotdata, aes(x=date, y=n, color=teamName))
p <- p + geom_point(size=3, position = position_jitter(w = 0, h = 0.1))
# p <- p + scale_x_date(breaks = "1 week", minor_breaks = "1 day",
#                       # labels = date_format("%b %Y"),
#                       limits = c(as.Date(beginDate), as.Date(endDate)))
p <- p + scale_color_brewer(palette = "Set1")
p <- p + scale_y_log10()
p  <- p + labs(y=expression(log[10]("access per user")), x="Day")
# p <- p + facet_grid(group ~ .)
p  <- p + mytheme + theme(axis.title.x=element_text(size=16),
                          axis.text.x=element_text(size=16, angle=270),
                          strip.text.y=element_text(size=20, angle=270),
                          legend.position="top")
p

```

#### Total accesses per user
```{r fig.width=20, fig.height=6, include=TRUE, eval=TRUE}
plotdata <- data.browse %>%
  count(userName) %>%
  filter(n > 10) %>% 
  ungroup() %>% 
  left_join(data.browse[, c("userName", "teamName")]) %>% 
  mutate(userName=reorder(userName, n, ordered=TRUE))

pUser <- ggplot(plotdata, aes(x=userName, y=n)) 
pUser <- pUser + geom_point(aes(color=teamName), size=3)
pUser <- pUser + scale_y_log10()
pUser <- pUser + scale_color_brewer(palette = "Set1")

pUser <- pUser + mytheme + theme(axis.text.x=element_blank())
# pUser <- pUser + mytheme + theme(axis.text.x=element_text(angle=270, hjust=0.5))
pUser <- pUser + labs(x="User")
pUser
```
